description: This is Stowe Bike Path which starts from the backside of white Church at the center of Stowe, VT.  There are 3-4 parking lot along with the Bike Path and you can start from those areas.  It crosses river multiple times with bridge. There are some easy level up and down.  People use this path for biking, hiking, walking, roller blading, cross country ski etc.  At the back side of white church, you can rent a bike as well.
directions: At the center of Stowe, white church is located at the junction of Rt 108 and Rt 100.  After exiting I-89 Exit 10, take Rt 100 North, eventually you reach to the junction to Rt 108.  Keep going on Rt 100 1 min, you'll see church at your left side.  After you pass the church, take left turn to get to the parking lot.
title: Stowe Bike Path
